name: ShapeCollider
description:
This game was made for the Mini Ludum Dare 68 with the theme Childhood Memories.
It is also inspired by the theme of the 35th Ludum Dare with the theme Shapeshift.
All Graphics and Code was created in 8 hours.
The Library was LibGdx.
The game is about the game for very young children to categorize a circle, a square
and a triangle
Can you buy all things in the Shop?

PS: First Ludum Dare.
